title: Financial Reporting (XBRL/iXBRL) Payload
description: Defines the structure for a submission containing a financial report in XBRL or iXBRL format.

report.description: The base64 encoded XBRL or iXBRL document.

reportingStandard.description: The financial reporting standard used (e.g., IFRS, GAAP).

periodEndDate.description: The end date of the reporting period.
